summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'EpiTator', 'ProMED' | EventEpi â€” A Natural Language Processing Framework for Event-Based Surveillance | A tool to extract the most important entites from a epidemiological text and to analyze them | This repo contains the work of EventEpi.
